metadata.name: PUA - Nimgrab Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the usage of nimgrab, a tool bundled with the Nim programming framework and used for downloading files.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\nimgrab.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('md5=2dd44c3c29d667f5c0ef5f9d7c7ffb8b')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha256=f266609e91985f0fe3e31c5e8faeeec4ffa5e0322d8b6f15fe69f4c5165b9559')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=c07fddd21d123ea9b3a08eef44aaac45'))))

output.summary: Detects the usage of nimgrab, a tool bundled with the Nim programming framework and used for downloading files.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of Nim on a developer systems Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/28d190330fe44de6ff4767fc400cc10fa7cd6540/atomics/T1105/T1105.md
